General, Internal & Family Medicine

We follow medical practice that focus on the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of illness and disease.

  • Primary care for adults to treat a wide range of medical conditions, from minor illnesses to chronic diseases.
  • Internal medicine focuses on the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of diseases in adults.
  • Family medicine, on the other hand, focuses on the comprehensive care of individuals and families across all ages.
  • With many people seeking IV treatments for various health and wellness concerns. IV treatments involve the administration of nutrients, vitamins and other supplements directly into the bloodstream through an intravenous infusion such as Vitamin C, Glutathione, Hydration, Anti-aging IV therapies etc.

Pediatrics

  • Dubai's population has grown significantly in recent years, with a growing number of families and children in the city. This has led to an increased demand for pediatric services.
  • We offer a comprehensive range of top-tier pediatric services, including preventive care, routine check-ups, vaccinations, and specialized treatments for children with complex medical needs.
  • We have specialized treatments for differently abled children such as Pediatric Rehabilitation Medicine focusing on physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy etc.
  • Development pediatrics for behavioral disorders in children. Developmental pediatricians work with children who have conditions such as autism and intellectual disabilities.

Gynaecology & Obstetrics

  • To generate a healthier generation, we should follow healthier life style practices during pregnancy.
  • Pre-pregnancy preparation, pregnancy period and post pregnancy period plays significance role in a baby’s health.
  • Our wellness clinic focuses on treatment options for both gynecological and infertility issues. Treatment may include medication, surgery, assisted reproductive techniques such as in vitro fertilization (IVF) and lifestyle changes such as diet and exercises.

Mental Health & Physiotherapy

  • Mental health is an essential aspect of overall health and well-being. It affects how we think, feel, behave and impacts our ability to cope with stress, maintain healthy relationships and function in our daily lives. We also need to be physically fit to have a healthy mind hence exercise is equally important.
  • We also need to be physically fit to have a healthy mind hence exercise is equally important.
  • Physiotherapy helps to have positive effects on mental health, cardiovascular health, rehabilitation after injury or surgery, prevention of injuries, management of chronic conditions, improved mobility and overall quality of life through exercises and physical activities.

Dermatology & Laser Treatments

  • Dubai is a hub for best dermatology and laser treatments, offering a wide range of advanced procedures and treatments for various skin conditions and concern.
  • Dubai's reputation as a luxury destination for medical tourism has contributed to the growth of the laser treatment industry, as people are willing to travel to Dubai for high-quality and advanced laser treatments.
  • Our clinics in Downtown Dubai has advanced treatments in laser hair removal from all areas of the body, acne treatment, skin rejuvenation, pigmentation treatment, scar removal, anti-aging, facial contouring, microneedling, chemical peeling, etc.

Dental

  • Dental cosmetology, in particular, has become increasingly popular in Dubai. This involves the use of advanced technology and techniques to enhance the appearance of teeth and create a more attractive smile.
  • Services such as teeth whitening, dental veneers and orthodontics are in high demand.
  • In addition to cosmetic dentistry and general dental services such as routine check-ups, fillings and extractions, we offer specialized services such as pediatric dentistry, periodontics and endodontics.

Orthopedic

Our orthopedic specialty focuses on the diagnosis, treatment and prevention of conditions and injuries related to the musculoskeletal system. This system includes bones, joints, muscles, ligaments, tendons and other connective tissues.

  • Conditions such as fractures, traumatic injuries to the musculoskeletal system, osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis or other degenerative joint diseases comes under orthopedic.
  • Sports-related injuries, such as ligament tears, tendonitis and stress fractures, spine disorders, hand and upper extremity, foot and ankle, pediatric orthopedics, musculoskeletal oncology, orthopedic rehabilitation etc are conditions treated under orthopedic.

Ayurveda

Armani Clinics boasts the best ayurvedic clinic and doctors, providing customers with good ayurveda experience in downtown dubai. We ensure the best quality of ayurveda treatment and authenticity.

  • Ayurveda reconnects our mind, body and soul with ultimate source of healing. It has result oriented treatments for life style diseases such as diabetes, hypertension, obesity and arthritis etc.
  • During the period 2018 – 2019, nearly 495,000 people have travelled to Kerala for Ayurvedic medical treatments, especially covering from GCC. After covid this has reduced due to travel restrictions and has increased the popularity of Ayurveda in GCC.

Clinical Yoga

“Clinical yoga" typically refers to the application of yoga practices and principles in a clinical or healthcare setting with a specific focus on addressing health conditions, promoting well-being, and supporting therapeutic outcomes.

  • Clinical yoga is often integrated into conventional medical practices to complement traditional healthcare approaches. It may be used as a complementary therapy alongside medications and other medical interventions.
  • Modified poses, breathing exercises, and meditation techniques may be used to alleviate symptoms associated with chronic pain, stress, anxiety, or other health conditions.

Clinical yoga can be applied to a wide range of health conditions, including musculoskeletal issues, cardiovascular health, mental health conditions, respiratory conditions and more.

Beauty, Personal Care & Wellness

  • Beauty: Beauty refers to the physical attributes and aesthetics of an individual. It include aspects such as clear skin, healthy hair, well-groomed nails and other features that are often considered visually appealing.
  • Personal Care: Involves maintaining cleanliness and good hygiene practices such as hair care, including washing, conditioning and styling. Haircuts and hair treatments are also part of this category. Body care such as moisturizing, exfoliating and protecting the skin from environmental factors are essential elements of personal care.
  • Wellness : Wellness encompasses physical wellness, mental and emotional wellness. Developing a balanced and personalized approach that aligns with one's values and health goals is key. It's important to prioritize practices that contribute to both the external and internal aspects of well-being.

Our clinics enhances the overall patient experience and contribute to their well-being by incorporating elements of beauty, personal care and wellness.

Electronic Muscle Stimulators (EMS)

Electronic Muscle Stimulators (EMS), also known as neuromuscular electrical stimulation (NMES) or electrotherapy, are devices that use electrical impulses to stimulate muscles.

  • Muscle Rehabilitation: EMS devices are commonly used in physical therapy and rehabilitation settings to aid in the recovery of injured or weakened muscles. They can help prevent muscle atrophy and improve muscle strength after surgery or injury.
  • Pain Management: Electrical stimulation can help modulate pain signals, providing relief for individuals experiencing chronic pain or discomfort.
  • Orthopedic Conditions: EMS can be incorporated for patients with orthopedic conditions such as muscle strains, sprains, or tendon injuries.
  • Sports Medicine: EMS is utilized in sports medicine for muscle conditioning and recovery. Athletes may use these devices to complement their training, reduce muscle soreness, muscle training, development and toning. It also improves blood circulation.

Home Healthcare

  • Our home care health services allow individuals to receive medical care and support in the comfort of their own homes.
  • Home care health services include nursing care, physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy, IV therapies, etc.
  • Comfort, less time and technology has made home services more viable in Downtown Dubai.
